description: CONVERSION OF THE FORMER ATKINSON MORLEY HOSPITAL MAIN BUILDING AND DEMOLITION OF EXTENSIONS AND OUTBUILDINGS AROUND THE HOSPITAL. DEMOLITION OF FORMER NURSES ACCOMMODATION AT THE FIRS. REDEVELOPMENT TO PROVIDE A TOTAL OF 94 RESIDENTIAL UNITS (TO INCLUDE 28 AFFORDABLE DWELLINGS). ALTERATION TO EXISTING VEHICULAR AND BUS ACCESS AND CREATION OF NEW BUS TURNAROUND. CREATION OF 765 SQM OF CLASS D2 (GYMNASIUM) USE AND 144 CAR PARKING SPACES. RETENTION OF 30 CAR PARKING SPACES FOR USE BY WOLFSON CENTRE.
